EmailTemplate.subject: Hello from HeadStart
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
HeadStart | The Challenge
HeadStart applications open in ONE WEEK!
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
HeadStart London is an exciting new programme from The Challenge for NCS Graduates which will support you to make a difference in your local community, whilst gaining new skills and experience to help you get ahead.
The HeadStart programme is made up of three simple steps:
Volunteer for at least 16 hours with a local charity. We’ll help you find the volunteering opportunity that fits with your interests and your free time.
Engage in exclusive skills workshops, developed with leading employers to give you the right skills and aptitude to get ahead.
Get a guaranteed interview for a paid part-time or seasonal job with New Look or Starbucks after completing 16 hours or more volunteering.
HeadStart will help you:
Gain skills and experience
Be more employable
Stand out on your UCAS form
Meet new people or get back together with friends from your wave
http://animoto.com/play/h3csCzFjCSmQ65b0NjK25Q
How do I volunteer? There’s TWO options:
Find your Own Volunteering Opportunity
Stand out from the crowd by showing initiative
Volunteer with a friend
Pursue your own interests
Receive support from the HeadStart team
How do I find my own? Watch this video for some tips:
http://animoto.com/play/4LxNdoJWW98geZlow92liw
Choose a HeadStart volunteering placement
Choose from a range of volunteering placements that start end of Oct/early Nov
Attend an introduction session
Try something new or pursue your interests
Volunteer with a HeadStart charity partner
Check your emails on 4th October for our application form!
Applications close on 12th October 2014.
Places are limited and will be working on a first come first serve basis.
The HeadStart London team
